articles.content:
A woman who left her AirPods on a flight and was told she couldn't retrieve them has revealed she tracked them down to an airport employee's home.

articles.title: Accenture puts 19,000 staffers' heads on the chopping block - The Register
articles.description: 2.5% of workforce to go as sales and margin growth forecasts dip
articles.content:
